item.description:
We will view the 1937 film "The Good Earth," based on Pearl Buck's novel on Saturday, September 25, starting at 3PM at the same location as the book discussion. The film runs 138 min.

"The performances, direction, and photography are of uniform excellence, and have been fused perfectly into a dignified, beautiful, and soberly dramatic production...The performances...are collectively splendid...The picture does full justice to the novel, and that is the highest praise one can give it."
--The New York Times


For updates and to sign up for our e-mail list, go to www.cthumanist.org
item.name: Film Viewing: "The Good Earth"
